SELECT COUNT(NO) FROM EMPLOYEE WHERE NOT NO IN ('0')
AND RESIGN_YN = 'N'
AND RESIGN_YN = 'Y'

SELECT M.NO, M.NAME, P.NAME POS_NO, D.NAME DEPT_NO, M.ID, TO_CHAR(ENROLL_DATE, 'YYYY.MM.DD') ENROLL_DATE, TO_CHAR(RESIGN_DATE, 'YYYY.MM.DD') RESIGN_DATE, RESIGN_YN FROM EMPLOYEE M LEFT OUTER JOIN POSITION P ON P.NO = M.POS_NO LEFT OUTER JOIN DEPARTMENT D ON D.NO = M.DEPT_NO WHERE NOT M.NO IN ('0')
AND RESIGN_YN = 'N'
AND RESIGN_YN = 'Y'
ORDER BY M.NO ASC

SELECT COUNT(M.NO) FROM EMPLOYEE M LEFT OUTER JOIN DEPARTMENT D ON D.NO = M.DEPT_NO
WHERE M.NAME LIKE '%'||#{keyword}||'%'
WHERE D.NAME LIKE '%'||#{keyword}||'%'
WHERE M.ID LIKE '%'||#{keyword}||'%'

mapper.insert: INSERT INTO EMPLOYEE(NO, POS_NO, DEPT_NO, ID, PWD, NAME, EMAIL, PHONE, ADDRESS, ADDRESS_DETAIL, PHOTO_NAME, PHOTO_PATH, PERMISSION) VALUES(SEQ_EMP_NO.nextval, #{posNo}, #{deptNo}, #{id}, #{pwd}, #{name}, #{email}, #{phone}, #{address}, #{addressDetail}, #{photoName}, #{photoPath}, #{permission})
mapper.select: SELECT NO, NAME, POS_NO, DEPT_NO, ID, PWD, EMAIL, PHONE, ADDRESS, ADDRESS_DETAIL, TO_CHAR(MODIFY_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') MODIFY_DATE, TO_CHAR(ENROLL_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') ENROLL_DATE, TO_CHAR(RESIGN_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') RESIGN_DATE, RESIGN_YN, PHOTO_NAME, PHOTO_PATH, PERMISSION FROM EMPLOYEE WHERE NO = #{no}
